title: Back of forearm & dorsum of the Hand

questions.question: 1. Which nerve supplies the motor innervation to the extensor muscles of the forearm?
2. What is the primary function of the extensor carpi radialis longus?
3. Which muscle is primarily responsible for extension of the fingers at the metacarpophalangeal joints?
4. Which muscle specifically extends the thumb at the interphalangeal joint?
5. The extensor carpi ulnaris muscle is primarily involved in which movement at the wrist?
6. Which muscle is a deep extensor that assists specifically in extending the index finger?
7. Which structure on the dorsum of the wrist prevents bowstringing of the extensor tendons?
8. Which branch of the radial nerve provides sensory innervation to the dorsum of the hand?
options: Superficial branch of the radial nerve
Deep branch of the radial nerve
Lateral cutaneous nerve of the forearm

questions.question: 9. Which tendon forms the lateral border of the anatomical snuffbox?
10. Which tendon forms the medial border of the anatomical snuffbox?
11. The dorsal digital extensor tendons insert into which structure on the fingers?
12. Which muscle is primarily responsible for extension of the little finger?
13. Which bony landmark serves as the insertion point for the extensor carpi radialis brevis?
14. Which muscle originates from the lateral epicondyle of the humerus and participates in wrist extension?
15. Which nerve branch is primarily responsible for the motor innervation of the extensor muscles in the forearm?
options: Deep branch of the radial nerve
Superficial branch of the radial nerve

questions.question: 16. Which muscle assists in extending the thumb and originates from the dorsal surface of the ulna?
17. Which of the following muscles is NOT typically found in the dorsal compartment of the forearm?
18. What is the primary action of the dorsal interossei muscles in the hand?
19. Which arterial network supplies blood to the dorsum of the hand?
20. Which structure on the dorsum of the hand is visible as a network of veins beneath the skin?
